sentences.en: A slender superstructure was dictated with gently sloping approaches rather than staircases.
sentences.cn: 细长的上部结构,带有微缓斜坡接坡,比布置阶梯为优.

sentences.en: China has rich water, grassland and sloping land resources which have great potential for exploitation.
sentences.cn: 中国水域 、 草原、山地资源丰富,开发潜力巨大.

sentences.en: Each firm will face a downward-sloping demand curve.
sentences.cn: 每一家企业都将面临需求曲线的下滑。

sentences.en: Having a slanting or sloping direction , course, or position; inclined.
sentences.cn: 斜的,倾斜的:有斜或坡形方向, 路径或位置的; 倾斜的.

sentences.en: I managed to pull myself up onto a wet, sloping ledge.
sentences.cn: 我终于爬上了一块潮湿倾斜的暗礁。

sentences.en: Pasterns : Short and strong and slightly sloping when viewed from the side.
sentences.cn: Pasterns:短期和强有力的和稍微倾斜时,从一侧.

sentences.en: Shoulders -- Clean , muscular and sloping, indicating speed and strength.
sentences.cn: 灵活, 肌肉强健,坡形, 显示了力量和速度.

sentences.en: Sloping walls on the bulk of the building create an optical illusion.
sentences.cn: 大楼主体的斜墙给人造成一种视错觉。

sentences.en: The increase of pollutants in the environment follows an upward sloping curv e.
sentences.cn: 环境污染的增加是按照倾斜上升的曲线变化的.

sentences.en: The increase of pollutants in the environment follows an upward sloping curve.
sentences.cn: 环境污染物的增加是按照倾斜上升的曲线变化的.

sentences.en: The sloping cropland distributes extensively in the TGRA with serious soil losses.
sentences.cn: 三峡库区农田坡耕地多,水土流失严重.

sentences.en: The three-storey residence is positioned on a sloping plot and is partially submerged in the descending ground.
sentences.cn: 这座三层的住宅位于一个倾斜的地块上，部分楼体淹没在下行地面以下。

sentences.en: Thereinto, 10.15 % in paddy field, 3.51 % in plain, and 7.14 % in sloping crop land.
They allowed water to drip down a sloping , red - hot, iron gun - barrel.
sentences.cn: 他们让水滴进倾斜的烧红的铁砧筒里.

sentences.en: Water waves approaching a sloping beach provide us a conspicuous illustration of the phenomenon of refraction.
sentences.cn: 向倾斜着的海滩接近的水波为我们提供了一幅明显的折射图像.
